INSERT INTO we_radar_tag_rel (radar_id, tag_id) values
(#{item.radarId},#{item.tagId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE radar_id = VALUES(radar_id), tag_id = VALUES(tag_id)
mapper.select: select wrtr.radar_id, wrtr.tag_id, wg.name tag_name from we_radar_tag_rel wrtr LEFT JOIN we_tag wg ON wg.tag_id = wrtr.tag_id where wrtr.radar_id = #{radarId}

SELECT wr.id, wr.radar_title, wr.url, wr.type, wr.cover_url, wr.title, wr.content, wr.is_defined, wr.create_time, wr.enable_click_notice, wr.enable_behavior_record, wr.enable_customer_tag, wr.enable_update_notice, wr.create_by user_id, wu.user_name, wu.main_department, wd.name from we_radar wr LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.corp_id = wr.corp_id AND wu.user_id = wr.create_by LEFT JOIN we_department wd ON wr.corp_id = wd.corp_id AND wu.main_department = wd.id WHERE wr.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wr.id = #{id}
SELECT tag_id FROM we_radar_tag_rel WHERE radar_id = #{id}
